name: Try This Quiz, Sucka! | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: Who said, "Jennifer, you've won an all expense paid kidnapping with the terrorist of your choice"?
questions.explanation:
Murdock.

	Murdock was talking to the client's daughter, Jennifer, in a game show host voice during the episode 'Harder Than It Looks'.

questions.text: Which team member goes by many different aliases?
questions.explanation:
Face.

	Face goes by the name Templeton Peck. He has several different aliases, but in 'Family Reunion' we found out his real name is Richard Bancroft.

Della Reese.

	Everyone first met BA's mother in 'Lease With An Option to Die'.

questions.text: Which team member plays Mr. Lee?
questions.explanation:
Hannibal.

	Mr. Lee was first introduced to Amy Allen. Mr. Lee is Hannibal's first identity to check out a prospective client.

questions.text: What color was the tablecloth Murdock wore in 'Taxicab Wars'?
questions.explanation:
orange and white.

	Murdock used the identity of Captain cab and wore a orange and white tablecloth as a cover for around his eyes and as a cape. He also had a sock named socky.

questions.text: In 'Dishpan Man', BA jumped out of the airplane on his own accord.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Face and Murdock pushed BA out of the airplane. Face: "Did you pull his cord?" Murdock: "No. . .Oops!"

questions.text: Where did Amy go for her foreign correspondent job?
questions.explanation:
Jakarta.

	Rumors ran rampant about what actually caused Melinda Culea to leave the show in the middle of the second season.

questions.text: On 'Mexican Slayride', what did we find out BA's doesn't like to do?
questions.explanation:
fly.

	This was the first time we saw BA knocked out. During the rest of the series he was either drugged or hit over the head. 'In Plane Sight' was the first time BA was hypnotized to be knocked out. The key word used was eclipse.

questions.text: Complete this T-shirt of Murdock's: "Minds are for those who _______."
questions.explanation:
think.

	The different sayings and pictures on Murdock's shirts became a trademark of his character. He wore a different saying on his shirt in almost all of the episodes.

questions.text: What was the first name of Face's college sweetheart?
questions.explanation:
Leslie.

	Face told Amy that Leslie left college on the day he was going to give her his fraternity pin and he never saw her again. It turns out Leslie became a nun. This was the first of two appearances by Markie Post as a love interest for Face.

questions.text: What was the name of Face's mother?
questions.explanation:
Samantha.

	Mr. Bancroft told Murdock the name of Face's mother after Murdock saw a picture of a teenage Face in Bancroft's possession. Murdock's knowledge of Face's family led to a fight between him and Face.

questions.text: BA had a football scholarship before he joined the Army.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Viewers found this out in 'Quarterback Sneak'.

questions.text: What was the name of the only real love interest of Hannibal's?
questions.explanation:
Maggie.

	She was a Captain in the Army and she sewed up BA after he was shot. Hannibal kissed her before putting her in a closet. She showed up again in the second season to help a poisoned A-Team.

questions.text: What song has the team NOT been known to sing on occasion?
questions.explanation:
'Louie, Louie'.

	They sang 'You Are My Sunshine' several times during the series. Face and Murdock sang 'Two Girls For Every Guy' in the third season opener and 'Itsy Bitsy Spider' on 'Cowboy George'. The team has never sung 'Louie, Louie'.

questions.text: What did Murdock's shirt say on the episode called 'The Grey Team'?
questions.explanation:
Fini.

	'The Grey Team' was the very last episode of the series so Murdock's shirt said Fini (finished). The episode was shown out of sequence. In 'Without Reservations', Murdock's shirt said 'Almost Fini' meaning it was the second to the last episode. 'Napoleon' was the word on the first shirt he ever wore on the show.
